scripts.build: npm run test:prebuild && vite build --mode development
scripts.build:prod: npm run test:prebuild && vite build --mode production
scripts.deploy:prod: npm version patch && npm run deploy:prod:nobump && npm run commit:patch
scripts.deploy:prod:nobump: npm run build:prod && firebase deploy && firebase database:set /version -f -d "{\"latest\": \"$npm_package_version\"}"
scripts.deploy:both: npm version patch && npm run deploy && npm run deploy:prod:nobump && npm run commit:patch
scripts.firebase:copy: firebase use report-base && firebase auth:export .tmp/auth.json && firebase database:get / --pretty -o .tmp/database.json && firebase use report-base-dev01 && firebase auth:import .tmp/auth.json && firebase database:set -f --disable-triggers / .tmp/database.json
